title: BISSELL CrossWave Cordless Max All in One Wet-Dry Vacuum Cleaner and Mop for Hard Floors and Area Rugs, Black, 2554A
descriptions:
**Introducing the BISSELL CrossWave Cordless Max - Revolutionizing Cleaning for Hard Floors and Area Rugs**

Are you tired of juggling multiple cleaning tools and dealing with messy cords? Look no further than the BISSELL CrossWave Cordless Max, a game-changing all-in-one wet-dry vacuum cleaner and mop designed to make quick work of dirt, dust, and grime on hard floors and area rugs.

**Unleash the Power of Cordless Cleaning**

With its advanced 36V Lithium-Ion battery, this powerful cleaner delivers up to 30 minutes of uninterrupted cleaning time, giving you the freedom to tackle even the toughest messes without being tethered to a power outlet.

**Multi-Surface Cleaning Made Easy**

The BISSELL CrossWave Cordless Max effortlessly glides across a variety of surfaces, including tile, sealed wood floors, laminate, linoleum, rubber floor mats, pressed wood floors, and area rugs. Its rotating brush system and 10.5-inch cleaning path width ensure a thorough and efficient cleaning experience.

**Advanced Features for a Deeper Clean**

This innovative cleaner boasts a range of advanced features, including:

* Improved edge cleaning for tight spaces and corners
* WiFi connectivity through the BISSELL Connect app for seamless cleaning and maintenance
* Self-cleaning cycle for hassle-free brush maintenance
* Two-tank technology for clean water and dirt separation

**Supporting a Great Cause**

With every purchase, you'll be supporting the BISSELL Pet Foundation, a non-profit organization dedicated to finding forever homes for pets in need.

**Get Started with a Comprehensive Cleaning Kit**

The BISSELL CrossWave Cordless Max comes with a range of included accessories, including:

* 2 Multi-Surface Trial Formulas
* 2 Hard Floor Sanitize Trial Formulas
* 2 Multi-Surface Brush Rolls

**Upgrade Your Cleaning Routine Today**

Don't settle for mediocre cleaning results. Experience the convenience, power, and versatility of the BISSELL CrossWave Cordless Max. Order yours now and discover a cleaner, healthier home with minimal effort.
